kuhakāmalamuktasya rajo vā tasya tāyinaḥ // Dhs_30.117 //
sevyate yā janairnityaṃ prākṛtaiḥ śīlavarjitaiḥ // Dhs_30.119 //
nāmnā saṅgaṇikā sevā saṃsāre bandhamātṛkā // Dhs_30.122 //
svadharma yaḥ parityajya paradharmeṣu rajyate // Dhs_30.124 //
svagṛhaṃ yaḥ parityajya paraveśyāni tiṣṭhati // Dhs_30.125 //
sadāyaṃ lāghavaṃ yāti nidhanaṃ cāśu gacchati /
tathā yo vimatirbhūto vidvanmānī janecchayā // Dhs_30.126 //
śaśvat sa patito dṛṣṭaḥ śāsanāntāt pravartate /
saṅkīrṇā dinacaryā ca kurvan bhikṣuḥ praṇaśyati // Dhs_30.132 //
lobhasatkāralābhaṃ ca kurvan bhikṣuḥ praṇaśyati // Dhs_30.133 //
saktūdakena santuṣṭaḥ sa bhikṣurniṣṭhuraḥ smṛtaḥ // Dhs_30.135 //
jñānasevī sthiraḥ śānta ekākī bhikṣurucyate // Dhs_30.140 //
na hi rājasevako bhikṣuryaḥ sevyo devatairapi /
prāntabhūmiṣu grāmasya sthitaḥ bhikṣuḥ praśobhate // Dhs_30.145 //
na tatsukhātsukhaṃ cānyadasti loke kathañcana // Dhs_30.147 //
raseṣu ramate bālastena mūḍho vihanyate // Dhs_30.148 //
svaparārthavidhijño yaḥ sa tuṣṭo bhikṣurucyate // Dhs_30.152 //
na karmaṇyavipāke ca mārgāmārge tathaiva ca // Dhs_30.155 //
kṣiṇoti retasaṃ svasya jīvitaṃ naiva gacchati // Dhs_30.159 //
na ca vindati yat kṛtvā sukhamanyatra bhujyate /
pāpāni yāti nityaṃ sa tena gacchati durgatim // Dhs_30.160 //
bhikṣurbhavati śuddhātmā na nivāsena karhicit // Dhs_30.164 //
lobhamoheṣu ye śaktāste śaktā tṛṣṇayā sadā /
tṛṣṇābandhanabaddhānāṃ nāyaṃ loko na cāparaḥ // Dhs_30.165 //
apakṣapātī dharmajño na sa gacchati durgatim // Dhs_30.166 //
mukto yo viṣayaiḥ sarvairāraṇyo munirucyate // Dhs_30.168 //
dagdhe kleśe vayaṃ dagdhā vanaṃ dagdhaṃ yathāgninā /
kalyāṇadharme saṃraktā na raktā kāmabhojane // Dhs_30.177 //
māyayā vañcakā (ye tu) mūḍhāste dharmavartmani // Dhs_30.178 //
ramante vītarāgāste na tu kāmagaveṣiṇaḥ // Dhs_30.179 //
na yāsyati puraṃ śāntaṃ yo ca mṛtyuṃ na vindati // Dhs_30.180 //
dhyānaṃ prajñātha nirvāṇo mano bhikṣuśca te daśa //
ramaṇīyāni puṇyāni phalaṃ teṣāṃ paraṃ śubham /
tasmāt kuruta puṇyāni nāsti puṇyasamaṃ dhanam // Dhs_31.1 //
pradīpasadṛśaṃ puṇyaṃ mātṛvat pitṛvat sadā // Dhs_31.2 //
puṇyaṃ kṛtvā gatā devāḥ puṇyaṃ nayati sadgatim /
puṇyaṃ kṛtvā narā loke modante tridive hi (te) // Dhs_31.3 //
puṇyādhikā hi puruṣā bhavanti sukhinaḥ sadā /
tasmāt kuruta puṇyāni nāsti puṇyasamaṃ sukham // Dhs_31.4 //
puṇyaṃ kṛtvā gatā devāḥ puṇyapriyadhanasya ca /
hetubhūtaṃ sadā dṛṣṭaṃ tasmāt puṇyaṃ paraṃ sukham // Dhs_31.5 //
tasmāt sukhaṃ paraṃ puṇyaṃ nāsti puṇyādṛte sukham // Dhs_31.6 //
kutasteṣāṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ sikatāsu yathā ghṛtam // Dhs_31.8 //
na teṣāṃ vidyate śarma duḥkhaṃ teṣāmanuttaram // Dhs_31.9 //
mānuṣyaṃ sukṛtaṃ hyetat kṛte bhavati dehinaḥ /
priyo bhavati yasyātmā yasya saukhye sthitā matiḥ /
puṇyakārī sadā dānto padaṃ gacchati cāvyayam /
vicitraṃ hi kṛtaṃ puṇyaṃ vicitraṃ paripacyate /
śamatrāṇo yathā dharmastasmād dharmarato bhavet // Dhs_31.14 //
yo (hi) dharma parityajya ramate kukṛte naraḥ /
tasya duṣkṛtadagdhasya duḥkhaṃ bhavati nityaśaḥ // Dhs_31.15 //
yo hi deśayate dharma pareṣāṃ hitakāṅkṣayā /
sa mātā sa pitā caiva nirvāṇapuradeśakaḥ // Dhs_31.17 //
na mūlyaṃ vidyate śāstuḥ subhāṣitapadasya vai // Dhs_31.18 //
na padaṃ labhate śāntaṃ yad dhanairupalabhyate /
dravyaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ na dharmo buddhibandhanam // Dhs_31.19 //
dravyaṃ vinaśyati nṛṇāṃ dharmadravyaṃ na jātu vai /
bhavatyavaśyaṃ patanaṃ tasmād dharmaparo bhavet // Dhs_31.22 //
dharma ekaḥ paraṃ trāṇaṃ dharma ekaḥ parā gatiḥ /
sa sukhāt sukhamāpnoti na duḥkhamanupaśyati // Dhs_31.24 //
sa tadā duḥkhamāpnoti narakeṣu punaḥ punaḥ // Dhs_31.25 //
sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhamātmanaivopabhujyate // Dhs_31.27 //
puṇyaprabhāvo vipulo yasya śīle rataṃ manaḥ // Dhs_31.28 //
bhavajanyaṃ phalaṃ yasya (yasmai) dharmo na rocate /
dharmo hi nayati svarga dharmacārī sukhānvitaḥ // Dhs_31.29 //
śreyo bhaveddhi maraṇaṃ na tu dharmavigarhaṇam /
dharmeṇa varjito lokaḥ saṃsāre sarvadā bhramet // Dhs_31.31 //
vṛthā saukhyamidaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā yāto yathāparaḥ // Dhs_31.32 //
prayānti tat padaṃ śāntaṃ yatra duḥkhaṃ na vidyate // Dhs_31.34 //
indriyāṇāṃ vaśe yastu viṣayeṣu tathaiva ca /
sa sarvabandhanairbaddhaḥ sa māraṃ nātivartate // Dhs_31.35 //
sa muktabhavakāntāraḥ svastho bhavati sarvataḥ // Dhs_31.36 //
buddho yeṣāṃ bahumato nityaṃ dharmaśca gocaraḥ /
udyogānāṃ sadā dhyānaṃ yena gacchati nirvṛtim // Dhs_31.40 //
kṣetrāṇāṃ trividhaṃ puṇyaṃ guṇaduḥkhobhayaṃ tataḥ // Dhs_31.42 //
mātā pitṛsamaḥ pūjya upādhyāyaḥ sadā bhavet /
agrāhyā vā sadā dṛṣṭā muninā tattvadarśinā /
sukhasya bhūmayo hyetā niḥsukhā viṣayā matāḥ // Dhs_31.44 //
saukhyaṃ tasya bhavennityaṃ na saukhyaṃ devabhūmiṣu // Dhs_31.45 //
sa āhūya prayatnena sevitavyaḥ sadā naraiḥ // Dhs_31.46 //
anāgate bhayaṃ yo hi paśyati buddhacakṣuṣā /
sa paṇḍitaḥ sadā dhīro mūrkhatvādatibhīrukaḥ // Dhs_31.47 //
sa hi vighne tu samprāpte na viṣādena bādhyate // Dhs_31.48 //
vimohitaḥ sa viṣayaiḥ paścāttāpena dahyate // Dhs_31.49 //
yāvat samagraṃ janmedaṃ jñānaṃ yāti vināvilam /
tāvat kuruta puṇyāni duḥkhaṃ hayakṛtapuṇyatā // Dhs_31.50 //
kṣayaṃ prayānti puṇyāni tvaritaṃ yāti jīvitam /
yo hi dharma parityajya pramādopahato naraḥ /
na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa paścādapi tapyate // Dhs_31.52 //
na yāvadāyāti jarā na vyādhiḥ saha mṛtyunā /
tāvat kāryāṇi puṇyāni mā paścāt paritapyatha // Dhs_31.53 //
narake kāraṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ pramādastvāṃ haniṣyati // Dhs_31.54 //
kiṃ tasya jīvitenārthaḥ kiṃ bhāgyaiḥ kiṃ ca bāndhavaiḥ /
sabalendriyatāṃ prāpya yo na dharmarataḥ sadā // Dhs_31.55 //
viratiścāpi pāpebhyaḥ sādhūnāṃ darśane na ca // Dhs_31.56 //
śīlena yaḥ suro janma labdhvedaṃ kāmamohitaḥ /
na sañcinoti puṇyāni sa bhavaṃ nātivartate // Dhs_31.57 //
kāmarāgāddhi ye bhītā devānāṃ devasammatāḥ // Dhs_31.58 //
devāste hi sadā vandyā ye dharme niratāḥ sadā /
ye tu nityaṃ bhavāsaktāste sarve nidhanaṃ gatāḥ // Dhs_31.59 //
na sañcarati yastūrṇa bhavānnaiva pramucyate // Dhs_31.60 //
saṅgṛhītaṃ sadā śīlaṃ jñānaṃ ca parivartitam /
dānaṃ cābhikṣayā dattaṃ bhavati svarasātmakam // Dhs_31.62 //
tasmād doṣān parityajya guṇāḥ sevyāḥ prayatnataḥ // Dhs_31.63 //
prāpya janmāntara cāpi nirvṛtiṃ cāśu gacchati // Dhs_31.65 //
panthāno muninā śāstre uktā ye tattvadarśinā /
satyaṃ hi dānaṃ ca tathaiva maitrī sattveṣu rakṣā priyavāditā ca /
yasya śuddhaṃ sadā cittaṃ nirmalaṃ maṇivat sadā /
sa śānto nirmamo dhīmān devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.5 //
sa dhīmān kāñcanaprakhyo devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.6 //
tṛṇavat kāñcanaṃ yasya kāmā yasya viṣopamāḥ /
sa kāmavarjako dhīmān devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.9 //
yaḥ karoti susaṃśliṣṭā devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.11 //
yasya buddhisthitaṃ veśma na buddhiḥ kvāpi rāgiṇī /
sa kāmavirato dhyāyī devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.13 //
na baddhaḥ strībhayaiḥ pāśairdevānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.14 //
manuṣyāṇāṃ balād devā devānāṃ balino narāḥ /
dharmādhīnaṃ sukhaṃ sarva dharmādhīnā hi nirvṛtiḥ /
dharmaḥ supteṣu jāgarti dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ // Dhs_32.20 //
jñānena varjito moho devaistu hyasurā jitāḥ // Dhs_32.21 //
sopānabhūtā ye tāni karmāṇi tridivasya hi /
yoniṃ tyaktvā narā yānti devalokaṃ sukhodayam // Dhs_32.22 //
prabhayā te ca divyantaḥ svaśarīreṇa jātayā /
ramante svargabhuvane rañjitāḥ svena karmaṇā // Dhs_32.24 //
yad devā devabhavane śīlaṃ tatra hi kāraṇam // Dhs_32.25 //
yadīpsitaṃ sambhavati sambhūtaṃ ca na hīyate /
vartate ca śubhaṃ nityaṃ tat sarva śubhahetukam // Dhs_32.27 //
dānamaitryā sadā yukto devānāṃ samatāṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.28 //
adatte na ratiḥ kiñcid dāne cāsya sadāmatiḥ /
vimanaskaṃ hi yat prīte puruṣe kurute laghu /
madyavarjī paraṃ dhīro devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.32 //
sukha (prāṇo) hi yo devaḥ pramādaṃ nānusevate /
atīva saukhyaṃ labhate kasmād deveṣu sarvadā // Dhs_32.36 //
etadagryaṃ tribhūmiṣṭhaṃ (triguṇaṃ ca) phalaṃ mahat // Dhs_32.38 //
yad devā divyamatayaḥ (kurvanti) śubhameva tat // Dhs_32.40 //
nyūnamadhyaṃ tu yasyaitat phalaṃ puṇyasya dṛśyate // Dhs_32.41 //
yena yāvaddhi yat puṇyaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati dehinā /
tasya tāvaddhi tat saukhyaṃ devalokeṣu pacyate // Dhs_32.42 //
svāgataṃ tava bho bhadra! sukṛtaṃ kṛtavānasi /
saptadhā rakṣitaṃ śīlaṃ tasyaitat phalamāgatam // Dhs_32.43 //
vanādriṣu ca naikeṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.45 //
saritsu ca viśālāsu (ramasva) saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.46 //
nagareṣu mahārtheṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.47 //
yakṣasadmasu ramyeṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.48 //
vimāneṣu ca ramyeṣu ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.49 //
nṛtyamānaḥ sukhī nityaṃ ramasva saha daivataiḥ // Dhs_32.50 //
tacchubhasya phalaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ nirmalasya viśeṣataḥ // Dhs_32.52 //
na vayaṃ hetavastatra (tatra hetuḥ) purākṛtam // Dhs_32.53 //
bhuñjanti vibudhāḥ svarga yaddhi pūrvakṛtānugam // Dhs_32.57 //
puruṣo labhate svasya prārabdhasya śubhāśubham // Dhs_32.59 //
na saukhyād viramantyete manaḥ saukhyena mohitāḥ // Dhs_32.62 //
trividhaṃ sukṛtaṃ kṛtvā bhāvayitvā ca saptadhā /
trisaṃkhyākān ripūn hatvā yānti deveṣu mānavāḥ // Dhs_32.63 //
sa nandyasūyakaḥ śuddho devānāmantikaṃ gataḥ // Dhs_32.64 //
samaṃ ca trividhaṃ dattvā devānāmantikaṃ gataḥ // Dhs_32.65 //
maitracittaḥ sadā dānto devānāmantikaṃ gataḥ // Dhs_32.66 //
adattaṃ ca dhanaṃ dattvā dattvānandaṃ ca sarvataḥ /
kathyate sa mṛṣāvādastaṃ hitvā sugatiṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.69 //
paiśūnyaṃ ca sadā hitvā maitryanarthakaraṃ padam /
adharmo yasya jihvāgre na bhūto na bhaviṣyati /
sa dhīraḥ śīlatattvajño devānāmantikaṃ vrajet // Dhs_32.73 //
tatprāpya yo na dharmajñaḥ sa paścāt paritapyate // Dhs_32.74 //
yadvicitramayo lokastat sarva śubhajaṃ phalam // Dhs_32.75 //
yena yena yathā karma kṛtaṃ bhavati śobhanam /
tasya tasya tathā dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ tadanugāmikam // Dhs_32.76 //
yena yena yathā cīrṇaṃ tasya tasya tathā phalam // Dhs_32.77 //
tannāśānmanasā mūḍhā na paśyanti mahadbhayam // Dhs_32.78 //
na vā kurvanti karmāṇi te 'surā mūḍhacetasaḥ // Dhs_32.79 //
phalaṃ yeṣāṃ priyaṃ cittaṃ na ca śīle ratā matiḥ /
vinābījaṃ phalaṃ nāsti vinā dīpaṃ kutaḥ prabhā? /
vinā śīlaiḥ kutaḥ svargo muktirjñānaṃ vinā kutaḥ? // Dhs_32.82 //
yaṃ neṣṭakaṃ bhavatyeva tat sarvamamalaṃ smṛtam // Dhs_32.84 //
yaṃ samāśritya krīḍanti devavṛndāni sarvataḥ // Dhs_32.90 //
ye bhavanti sadā dāntāste janāḥsvargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.91 //
vairiṇāṃ viṣayo nityaṃ praśāntamanasastu ye // Dhs_32.92 //
saṃsāre ye na rakṣanti svamano (nanu) dehinaḥ /
nirvāṇābhiratā nityaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.95 //
vṛkṣamūle śmaśāne vā tathā ca girikandare /
maitreṇa cetasā ye tu te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.97 //
kāryākāryavidhijñā ye te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.99 //
dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ ye ca paśyanti vividhā samāḥ /
na ca rakṣanti saṃsāre te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.100 //
paśyanti ca na rakṣanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.101 //
ye jānanti (sadā) cittāḥ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.102 //
paśyanti ye bhayaṃ loke te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.104 //
saṃtuṣṭāḥ svena cittena te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.106 //
na rātrau na divā yeṣāṃ kausīdyadyutiriṣyate /
nityodyuktavihārā ye te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.107 //
kaukṛtyaṃ styānamiddhaṃ ca kausīdyaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
varjayanti sadā dhanyāste janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.108 //
saṃkṣipanti sadā duḥkhaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.109 //
ye paśyanti budhāḥ prajñāṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.110 //
duḥkhaṃ duḥkhavipākaśca duḥkheṣu ca manaśca yat /
paśyanti ye sadā tattvaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.111 //
śuklāvadātaṃ ye vastraṃ pāṃsukūlaṃ tathaiva ca /
piṇḍapātaratā nityaṃ te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.113 //
naiṣkarmyaniratāḥ sarve te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.114 //
santuṣyanti na kupyanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.115 //
śuklāvadātaṃ ye vastraṃ pāṃsukūlaṃ tathaiva ca /
saṃvṛtau caiva saṃtuṣṭāste janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.116 //
śayyātale yathā bhūmau harmyāgre vā tathāpare /
na duṣyanti (na hṛṣyanti) te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.117 //
tattvato ye prapaśyanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.118 //
apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi ye śrutvā tīvrasambhramāt /
saṃkṣipanti na rakṣanti te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.120 //
karmaṇāṃ ca vipākaṃ ca kṛtaṃ (ye dhīracetasā) /
bibhyatīha sadā duḥkhete janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.122 //
kurvanti vidhivat sarva te janāḥ svargagāminaḥ // Dhs_32.123 //
teṣāṃ sukhaṃ yathāvat syāt nirvāṇapuradarśakam // Dhs_33.1 //
dhū(ma) miśraṃ yathā kāṣṭhaṃ vi(ṣṭhā) miśraṃ yathodanam /
yeṣāṃ tṛṣṇānugā cāśā sarvathā naiva cetasi // Dhs_33.5 //
sa dhīraḥ pāragaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sukhī nirvāṇamāśritaḥ // Dhs_33.7 //
yatra rāgādinirmuktaṃ tat sukhaṃ nirmalaṃ matam // Dhs_33.8 //
sa sukhāt sukhatāṃ yāti yatra tṛṣṇā na bādhate // Dhs_33.9 //
mṛtyupāśairna baddhasya na sukhaṃ vidyate kvacit /
yat sukhaṃ kāmajanakaṃ na tat saukhyaṃ satāṃ matam // Dhs_33.10 //
yat sukhaṃ janayet śreyaḥ (payomiśraṃ) yathodanam // Dhs_33.11 //
yathā padmavane gṛddhā yānti(te) kravyabhakṣiṇaḥ // Dhs_33.12 //
kvacicchāntaṃ vanaṃ ramyaṃ kvacid devāḥ pramādinaḥ // Dhs_33.13 //
viparītaṃ na sadṛśaṃ bhānoḥ śītā yathā prabhā /
gatatṛṣṇasya yat saukhyaṃ muktaduḥkhasya tāyinaḥ // Dhs_33.14 //
tat sukhaṃ tat paraṃ saukhyaṃ nedaṃ tṛṣṇāvidāṃ matam /
munisevyaṃ vanamidaṃ sevitaṃ ca subhāṣitaiḥ // Dhs_33.16 //
yadetad bhavatāṃ saukhyametanna khalu śāśvatam // Dhs_33.17 //
tat sukhaṃ paramaṃ śāntaṃ vītatṛṣṇai niṣevyate /
niḥsevitaṃ vanamidaṃ ye gatāḥ paramaṃ padam // Dhs_33.18 //
nārhanti sevituṃ ramyaṃ vanaṃ śāntaṃ subhāṣitam /
śāntaṃ ca bhāvitaṃ (caiva) ramate śubhagocare // Dhs_33.20 //
na rāgavyākulaṃ cittaṃ vaneṣu labhate dhṛtim // Dhs_33.21 //
sa ratiṃ labhate śāntiṃ vane puruṣasattamaḥ // Dhs_33.22 //
sa śāntiṃ naiva labhate vane śānte sukhāvahe // Dhs_33.23 //
yeṣāṃ tu manasā nityaṃ vane dhyānaniyoginām /
vanaṃ teṣāṃ sadāramyaṃ na tu rāgagaveṣiṇām // Dhs_33.24 //
vaneṣu bhāvitaṃ cittaṃ nagareṣu na kupyate /
tasmād vanaṃ sadā sevyaṃ nagaraṃ naiva śasyate // Dhs_33.25 //
vikṣipta mohakuṭilaṃ vanaṃ bhūyaḥ prasīdati // Dhs_33.26 //
tasmād vanaṃ paraṃ śāntaṃ yogināmālayaṃ mahat /
saṃsevyaṃ vītamanasā yasya tad vītakalmaṣam // Dhs_33.27 //
na yāmeṣvapi sā dṛṣṭā nityaṃ rāgānurāgiṇī // Dhs_33.29 //
yā tu kleśavaśāt prītiḥ (sā prītiḥ) śāśvatā nahi // Dhs_33.30 //
yasmāt tat pratibaddhaṃ hi śreyasāṃ padamucyate // Dhs_33.31 //
sudṛṣṭaṃ labhate sthānaṃ yatra doṣo na vidyate // Dhs_33.32 //
yaḥ kṣiptamanasā nityaṃ na ca dharmaparāyaṇaḥ /
teṣāṃ vṛthā sukhamidaṃ gacchati na nivartate // Dhs_33.33 //
ye tu tattvavido dhīrāḥ paśyanti jagataḥ sthitim /
anityaduḥkhaśūnyānāṃ teṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ na vidyate // Dhs_33.34 //
tat sukhaṃ sāstravaṃ nityaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // Dhs_33.37 //
tat sukhaṃ tadvitṛṣṇasya nīrāgasya hi dehinaḥ /
muktirbhavati doṣasya pārasthasya hi tāpinaḥ // Dhs_33.38 //
tat kiñcit sāsravaṃ saukhyaṃ tat sarva kṣaṇikaṃ matam /
rāgabandhād vinirmuktaṃ tat sarva niścalaṃ sukham // Dhs_33.39 //
ye na kṣipanti duḥkhena sukhe yeṣāṃ na saṅgatiḥ /
anupāyena ye mūḍhāḥ prārthayanti sukhaṃ sadā /
bālukābhiryathā tailaṃ yallabhyaṃ nityameva tat // Dhs_33.41 //
śakro 'pi tat sukhaṃ kartu yathā karma kṛtaṃ mahat // Dhs_33.42 //
sasukhaṃ yasya tu manaḥ saddharmānucaro bhavet /
duḥkhairmuktyabhilāṣo 'yaṃ sa dharme kurute matim // Dhs_33.43 //
nāhetukaṃ sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā trividhātmakam /
sukhe duḥkhe pṛthagbhāve tasmānnu sukṛta caret // Dhs_33.44 //
nedaṃ saukhyaṃ sadā śastamadhruvaṃ vipralopi ca /
tat saukhyaṃ (hi)satāṃ śastaṃ yatra mṛtyurna vidyate /
na ca priyeṇa viśleṣo nāpriyeṇa samāgamaḥ // Dhs_33.46 //

body.p:
yat sukhaṃ duḥkhajanakaṃ kathaṃ tat sukhamiṣyate?
duḥkhād duḥkhataraṃ jñeyaṃ pariṇāmavaśena tat // Dhs_33.48 //

lg.l: sa dhīmān suraloke ca gatvānyallabhate sukham // Dhs_33.50 //
bhuktaṃ sukhaṃ purāṇaṃ tu hīnakarma karoti ca /
purāṇaṃ sukṛtaṃ śīrṇa mṛtyukāle na budhyate // Dhs_33.51 //
cañcalormi sukhaṃ sarva vinipāto bhavārṇave // Dhs_33.53 //
nāśayitvā sukhaṃ sarva nāśayitvā ca jīvitam /
yadatīva sukhaṃ nṛṇāṃ taddhi saukhyāya kalpyate /
yannaiṣyati sukhaṃ kiñcit taddhi naiva vigaṇyate // Dhs_33.56 //
sarva hyanātmajaṃ duḥkhamanityaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ balam // Dhs_33.57 //
yad sukhaṃ triṣu lokeṣu na śastaṃ tattvadarśibhiḥ /
tena matvā kathaṃ devā bhavanti vigatajvarāḥ? // Dhs_33.58 //
yo bhokṣyate surān sarvān śuṣkendhanamivānalaḥ // Dhs_33.59 //
atiyāti sukhaṃ sarva kriyatāṃ śraiyasaṃ manaḥ /
mā paścāt saṃbhavo yoge mṛtyukālo bhaviṣyati // Dhs_33.60 //
tasmānna (sukha) saktasya sukhaṃ bhavati naiṣṭhikam // Dhs_33.62 //
sukhī bhavati tat prāpya na sukhaṃ bhavajanmanaḥ /
jñānena hi nivartante indriyāṇi svagocare // Dhs_33.66 //
yatra duḥkhaṃ vipākaṃ syāt tat sukhaṃ duḥkhameva tat // Dhs_33.68 //
pāpasya hetujaṃ duḥkhaṃ pāpasyākaraṇaṃ sukham // Dhs_33.69 //
nivartayati yaḥ pāpād vyasanāccāpi rakṣati // Dhs_34.1 //
mitraṃ bhavati tannṛṇāṃ na mitraṃ pāpakārakam // Dhs_34.2 //
taddoṣāt sadṛśo dṛṣṭaḥ śubho vā yadi vāśubhaḥ // Dhs_34.4 //
tenāsau duḥkhamāpnoti na śubhaṃ duḥkhakāraṇam // Dhs_34.5 //
yaśasā yujyate yo hi nityaṃ sādhusamāgamāt /
sādhubhiśca sadā vāso duṣṭāṇāṃ ca vivarjanam // Dhs_34.8 //
na māninaṃ kusīdaṃ vā nityaṃ sarvānuśaṅkinam /
uttamaṃ bhajamānasya na doṣebhyo bhayaṃ bhavet // Dhs_34.12 //
bhayapradaṃ taṃ mātaṅgaḥ prayāntaṃ naiva paśyati // Dhs_34.13 //
laghutāṃ yāti loke 'smin pretyapāpeṣu pacyate // Dhs_34.14 //
teṣāṃ na suśamaṃ (karma) pretyapāpeṣu pacyate // Dhs_34.15 //
rūpaiśvaryakulārthā ye na te tattvasya bhāginaḥ /
atattvabuddhayo bālā na taranti bhavārṇavam // Dhs_34.16 //
yeṣāṃ jñānaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca te kule mahati sthitāḥ // Dhs_34.18 //
saṃyuktā ye kulīnāste ye na dharmavivarjitāḥ // Dhs_34.20 //
tasmātkulaṃ jñānamayaṃ jñānahīnaṃ na tat kulam // Dhs_34.21 //
sa rājā dhārmiko dhīmān svargalokopapattaye // Dhs_35.1 //
niyataṃ yaḥ karaṃ kāle dharmeṇa paribhujyate /
sa rājā lobhanirmukto yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.2 //
sa mahīṃ pālayettvenāṃ loke hi śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ // Dhs_35.3 //
baddhadarśī mahātmā yo gurupūjaka eva ca /
na ca hiṃsati bhūtāni sa deveṣūpapadyate // Dhs_35.6 //
sa matvāryāṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ devalokaṃ mahīyate // Dhs_35.7 //
na strīṇāṃ vaśago rājā sādhūnāṃ ca vaset sadā /
na sarvasya vacogrāhī priyaḥ sādhujanasya tu /
sa śuddha eva vimalo yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.12 //
pravijitya mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ pretya devapriyo bhavet // Dhs_35.13 //
priyasya tu bhaved vākyaṃ stotrotsavakaraṃ param /
hrāsavṛddhī ca bhūtānāmakasmāt kurute hi yaḥ /
sa rājā vai paro devairdevaloke ca tiṣṭhati // Dhs_35.16 //
sa dhībalābhyāṃ saṃyukto yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.17 //
yastat pūjayate rājā sa deveṣūpajāyate // Dhs_35.18 //
kālaṃ niyatadarśī yaḥ prajānāṃ ca hite rataḥ /
jñānagocarasampūjyo niyataṃ deva eva saḥ // Dhs_35.20 //
nāśayitvā sa doṣaughān pretya svargeṣu jāyate // Dhs_35.21 //
sa mitraiḥ samparivṛto nṛpo devādhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.22 //
sa sadyo viṣanirmuktaḥ surāṇāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.23 //
na śaktaḥ pānabhojyeṣu saṃsaktastu śubhe sadā /
dharmodayena dṛṣṭena yathā yāti triviṣṭapam // Dhs_35.26 //
sa dhārmikaḥ praśastātmā suraloke mahīyate // Dhs_35.28 //
yaste prakurute dharmān sa surādhipatāṃ vrajet // Dhs_35.29 //
yo devatāṃ pūjayati yathā cāhni mahīpatiḥ /
sa devapūjito bhūyo devānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.31 //
sa śīlavān divaṃ yāti nityaṃ śīlena rakṣitaḥ // Dhs_35.33 //
sa śīlavān divaṃ yāti nityaṃ śīlena rakṣitaḥ // Dhs_35.35 //
praśāsti ca mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ yāmānāmadhipo bhavet // Dhs_35.36 //
jano nirmalatāṃ yāti śaraccandra ivāmbare // Dhs_35.37 //
tvayā viśodhito vākyaistamaḥ sūryodaye yathā // Dhs_36.15 //
ye ca dharmā hetubhavā teṣāṃ tathāgato 'vadat /

body.p: mohāśivādirahitasya vākyavidyasya vipulārjanasya 'dharmasamuccayo' nāma dharmaparyāyaḥ samāptaḥ /
